prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FamMedOvenBakes_001",
  "name": "Family Mediterranean Oven Bakes (Italian/Spanish/Portuguese)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Italian",
      "Spanish",
      "Portuguese"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Baked Orzo with Chorizo, Peppers, and Mozzarella",
  "description": "Family-friendly Italian–Spanish oven bake where orzo cooks in a tomato sauce with chorizo and peppers, finished bubbly with mozzarella and parmesan.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F).",
    "Dice onion and finely chop garlic.",
    "Slice bell peppers into strips.",
    "Cut chorizo into bite-size pieces.",
    "Measure orzo, passata, and chicken stock.",
    "Grate parmesan and tear or slice mozzarella."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Heat a large oven-safe dish on the stovetop over medium heat with olive oil.",
    "Add chorizo and onion; cook 3–4 minutes until chorizo renders and onion softens.",
    "Stir in garlic and bell peppers; cook 1 minute to soften slightly.",
    "Turn off heat. Stir in orzo, passata, chicken stock, oregano, a pinch of sea salt, and pepper; level the mixture.",
    "Cover tightly with foil and bake 20 minutes.",
    "Uncover, stir, and check orzo doneness; bake uncovered 5–10 minutes more until orzo is tender and sauce thickened.",
    "Top with mozzarella and parmesan; bake 5 minutes until cheese melts and bubbles.",
    "Rest 5 minutes, then taste and adjust sea salt and pepper. Serve hot."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chorizo",
      "quantity": "300 g",
      "preparation": "cut into bite-size pieces"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "sliced into strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "orzo",
      "quantity": "300 g (about 1 1/2 cups)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "passata",
      "quantity": "700 g (about 3 cups)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken stock",
      "quantity": "2 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sea salt",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mozzarella",
      "quantity": "200 g",
      "preparation": "sliced or torn"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parmesan cheese",
      "quantity": "30 g",
      "preparation": "grated"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Italian",
      "Spanish"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
